languages.text: Эти {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}таланты{/g} более сильные, чем обычные, и большинство из них универсальны — только редкие требуют особых условий (например, наличие способности Рывок или псайкерских способностей).

These {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} are more powerful than regular {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} talents, and most of them are versatile — only a few of them require that certain conditions are met (such as the character having access to Charge or {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}).
languages.original_text: Эти {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}таланты{/g} более сильные, чем обычные, и большинство из них универсальны — только редкие требуют особых условий (например, наличие способности Рывок или псайкерских способностей).

traits.locale_text: These talents are more powerful than regular doctrine talents, and most of them are versatile — only a few of them require that certain conditions are met (such as the character having access to Charge or psychic powers).

These talents are more powerful than regular doctrine talents, and most of them are versatile — only a few of them require that certain conditions are met (such as the character having access to Charge or psychic powers).

These talents are more powerful than regular doctrine talents, and most of them are versatile — only a few of them require that certain conditions are met (such as the character having access to Charge or psychic powers).

These {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} are more powerful than regular {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} talents, and most of them are versatile — only a few of them require that certain conditions are met (such as the character having access to Charge or {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}).

languages.text: Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} sind mächtiger als normale {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyptalente{/g} und die meisten von ihnen sind vielseitig – nur einige wenige erfordern das Erfüllen bestimmter Bedingungen (wie z. B. benötigter Zugriff eines Charakters auf Ansturm oder {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g}).
languages.original_text: These {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} are more powerful than regular {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} talents, and most of them are versatile — only a few of them require that certain conditions are met (such as the character having access to Charge or {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} sind mächtiger als normale Doktrintalente und die meisten von ihnen sind vielseitig — nur einige wenige erfordern das Erfüllen bestimmter Bedingungen (wie z. B. benötigter Zugriff eines Charakters auf Ansturm oder {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionische Kräfte{/g}).

languages.text: Ces {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} sont plus puissants que les talents d’{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} classiques et la plupart d'entre eux sont polyvalents. Seuls quelques talents exigent que certaines conditions soient réunies (comme l'accès du personnage à la Charge ou à des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}).
languages.original_text: These {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} are more powerful than regular {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} talents, and most of them are versatile — only a few of them require that certain conditions are met (such as the character having access to Charge or {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Ces {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} sont plus puissants que les talents de doctrine classiques et la plupart d'entre eux sont polyvalents. Seuls quelques talents exigent que certaines conditions soient réunies (comme l'accès du personnage à la Charge ou à des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}).

languages.text: 此类{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}比普通的{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}天赋更加强大，而且绝大部分天赋适用于各种各样的角色。只有少数天赋需要角色满足特定条件，例如：角色需要学会英勇冲锋能力，或掌握{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}。
languages.original_text: These {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} are more powerful than regular {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} talents, and most of them are versatile — only a few of them require that certain conditions are met (such as the character having access to Charge or {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}).

traits.locale_text: 此类{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}比普通的信条天赋更加强大，而且绝大部分天赋适用于各种各样的角色。只有少数天赋需要角色满足特定条件，例如：角色需要学会英勇冲锋能力，或掌握{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能力量{/g}。

languages.text: Esta clase de {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} es más poderosa que los talentos de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g}. La mayoría de ellos, además, son de lo más versátiles, pues pocos únicamente requieren que se cumplan ciertas condiciones (como que el personaje tenga acceso a Carga o a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}).
languages.original_text: These {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} are more powerful than regular {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} talents, and most of them are versatile — only a few of them require that certain conditions are met (such as the character having access to Charge or {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Esta clase de {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} es más ventajosa que los talentos de doctrina. La mayoría de ellos, además, son de lo más versátiles, pues pocos únicamente requieren que se cumplan ciertas condiciones (como que el personaje tenga acceso a Carga o a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g}).

languages.original_text: These talents are more powerful than normal talents, and most of them are universal — only rare ones require special conditions (such as having the Jerk ability or psyker abilities).

languages.text: これらの{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}は通常の{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}よりも強力であり、たいていは多用途である。一部、特定の条件を要するものも少数ある（キャラクターが突撃や{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を解放済みである等）。
languages.original_text: These {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} are more powerful than regular {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} talents, and most of them are versatile — only a few of them require that certain conditions are met (such as the character having access to Charge or {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}).

traits.locale_text: これらの{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}は通常のドクトリンよりも強力であり、多くは多用途である。一部、特定の条件を要するものも少数ある（キャラクターが突撃や{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}を解放済みである等）。
